author: Emah Madegwa, Media and PR Manager
title: Benzer Pharmacy Mobile App Now Available on iOS and Android Devices: A New Frontier in the Digital Landscape
text:
An official mobile app for Benzer Pharmacy is now available on iOS and Android devices. The company officially released a new app Tuesday September 1, 2015, to help people manage their health in one convenient place. The sphere of healthcare is constantly developing and striving to embrace the newest forms of technology in order to optimize function. Many opportunities for mobile applications pertinent to the healthcare sector are now emerging.
The Benzer Pharmacy mobile app allows users to connect with over 40 Benzer Pharmacies nationwide to quickly act as a communication aid and provide support to the patient within the community setting. The app helps manage prescriptions as patients can now send prescriptions to Benzer Pharmacy without calling, and can also manage refill reminders.
“Patients can easily manage prescriptions with this easy to use mobile app,” says Dhara Patel, Benzer Pharmacy IT coordinator. “All users need to do is select a preferred prescription service, enter a name, email ID, zip code and scan the prescription barcode,” explains Dhara.
Features of the Benzer Pharmacy mobile app include: pharmacy locations, manage prescriptions, services, registration, and contact information.
For all new customers, a registration tab is available. The pharmacy is offering a $20 off on the purchase of over-the-counter medication with a transfer of two or more prescriptions.
Users can also use this app to set reminders to take and/or refill medications, look up information about medications, view news/events at the pharmacy and receive messages from the pharmacy.
This app is a must-have for anyone. Download the app for free today!
ABOUT BENZER PHARMACY
Benzer Pharmacy is a chain of independent retail pharmacies specializing in compounding and specialty medication. The first Benzer Pharmacy was opened in year 2009. There are currently over 40 locations throughout Florida, Michigan, Virginia, North Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Georgia, Nevada and Louisiana. The pharmacy is projected to grow rapidly in-order to make maximum reach to customers. Benzer Pharmacy recently earned position 1500 on the 2015 Inc. 5000 list for the fastest - growing private company in America and made the list in the Florida Fast 100 as one of the fastest-growing private companies in the state of Florida. All Benzer Pharmacy medications require a doctor's prescription. For more information: http://www.benzerpharmacy.com
